snippet.title: MARVEL HERO TALES - Gameplay Walkthrough Part 1 iOS / Android
snippet.description:
Channel: https://www.youtube.com/igvgameplayreviews
Twitter: https://twitter.com/igvgaming
Facebook: https://facebook.com/igvgameplay
Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/user/IGVGameplayreviews?sub_confirmation=1
Email: iosgameplayvideos@gmail.com

iTunes iOS Download link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kuatostudios.marvelherotales
Google Play Android Download link: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/marvel-hero-tales/id1449137879?mt=8&app=itunes

Join Spider-Man and Ms. Marvel along with all your favorite Marvel heroes and discover a brand new way of experiencing Marvel adventures! Run, jump and swing your way across New York City as you use the power of words to defeat the bad guys and tell your very own stories, with new adventures being added all the time!

Marvel Hero Tales uses a unique and innovative system that lets YOU control the story through the power of language. Developed with experts in language development, the system is mapped to UK Key Stage 2/US 2nd Grade reading skills to help with vocabulary development. Your tale of crime, adventure, and triumph can then be turned into your own comic book to keep, reminding you how you defeated evil and saved the world!


Game Features:


UNLOCK NEW WORDS AND SUPERCHARGE YOUR STORY to create your own unique comics


ADVENTURE WITH YOUR FAVORITE SUPER-HEROES in unique Marvel stories and defeat supervillains!


UNLOCK WORDS AND PERSONALIZE YOUR OWN STORY as you make decisions that you can read back on completion in your own digital comic book!


NEW STORIES, HEROES, VILLAINS AND EVEN MORE being released every month!


MINIMUM DEVICE REQUIREMENTS:


Marvel Hero Tales requires an iPhone 6 or newer, an iPad Air 2 or newer, an iPad mini 2 or newer and any iPad Pro*, and 742MB of free space to install. You will need iOS 9.0 or newer.


*iPod Touch devices, iPhones released before September 2014 and any iPads released before October 2014 are NOT currently supported.
=================================================
